titles.title: Commending and congratulating the Portland Thorns Football Club on winning the 2022 National Women's Soccer League championship.
Commending and congratulating the Portland Thorns Football Club on winning the 2022 National Women's Soccer League championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Portland Thorns Football Club on winning the 2022 National Women's Soccer League championship and completing a successful 2022 season.
